meanings.definition: In an attractive or endearing manner.
meanings.sent1: The puppy wagged its tail cutely.
meanings.sent2: She smiled cutely at the baby.
meanings.sent3: The kitten blinked cutely at the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The flowers swayed cutely in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The child giggled cutely while playing with the bubbles.

meanings.definition: In a charming or pleasing way.
meanings.sent1: The little girl danced cutely in her pretty dress.
meanings.sent2: He sang cutely to impress his friends.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chattered cutely while eating a nut.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled cutely in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The old couple held hands cutely as they walked in the park.
